long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
➤ Kelimat: Master English While Enjoying Your Favorite Content 🌍📚🎥

Learn English effortlessly with Kelimat, the ultimate language learning Chrome extension. Seamlessly integrate English learning into your daily online activities—browse websites 🌐, watch YouTube videos 🎬, and stream movies on Netflix 🍿, all while improving your language skills.

➤ Key Features 🌟
1. Instant Word Definitions & AI-Powered Translations 📖🤖
• Right-Click for Meanings: Simply right-click on any word to see its definition or translation in a clear and concise popup.
• AI-Powered Assistance: Utilize advanced AI translation to understand complex vocabulary in real-time.

2. Smart Word Highlighting ✍️✨
• Automatic Detection: Kelimat automatically highlights unfamiliar words across websites 🌐, YouTube 🎥, and Netflix 🍿.
• Vocabulary Building: Save these words for later review to boost your vocabulary efficiently.

3. Personalized Practice 📝🎯
• Tailored Exercises: Access your profile to review and practice saved words with exercises designed just for you.
• Interactive Learning: Engage with videos, articles, and AI-generated lessons that adapt to your learning pace.

➤ Boost Your Memory and Vocabulary 🧠🔠
• Save and Review: Never miss a chance to learn—save words and revisit them anytime.
• Reinforcement: See your saved words highlighted wherever they appear online to reinforce memory retention.
• Customizable Learning Paths: Focus on the areas that matter most to you with personalized content.

➤ Learn on the Go with Multilingual Support 🌏🗣️
• Netflix & YouTube Integration: Transform your favorite shows and videos into interactive language lessons.
• Supports Multiple Native Languages: Currently supporting Arabic 🕌, Spanish 🇪🇸, Russian 🇷🇺, Mandarin 🇨🇳, and French 🇫🇷—more languages coming soon!
• Efficient Learning: Incorporate language acquisition seamlessly into your daily routine.

➤ Perfect for Students and Learners 🎓📖
• Boost Exam Prep: Improve vocabulary and fluency to excel in TOEFL, IELTS, and other tests.
• Learn from Real Content: Watch TEDx talks 🎤, BBC documentaries 📺, or stream Netflix to learn naturally.
• Seamless Learning: Integrate learning into your daily browsing activities effortlessly.

➤ Why Choose Kelimat? 🤔✨
• Seamless Integration: No need to disrupt your browsing or streaming; Kelimat works in the background.
• User-Friendly Interface: Designed for ease of use, suitable for learners at all levels.
• AI-Driven Insights: Benefit from AI analytics that track your progress 📊 and adjust to your learning style.

➤➤➤ Start Learning Today 🚀📥
Download Kelimat for Chrome and say goodbye to the frustration of traditional language learning methods. Embrace a new way of mastering English—right where you spend most of your time online.

➤➤➤ We're in Beta 🧪🔧
As we continue to improve Kelimat, your feedback is invaluable. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions, please let us know. Together, we'll make language learning accessible and enjoyable for everyone.
